Bundler/InsecureProtocolSource.description:
Description

The source `:gemcutter`, `:rubygems` and `:rubyforge` are deprecated because HTTP requests are insecure. Please change your source to 'https://rubygems.org' if possible, or 'http://rubygems.org' if not.
Bundler/InsecureProtocolSource.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

Severity: warning (type: str)
AllowHttpProtocol: True (type: bool)
